answers.answer: Contact your caregiver to be on the safe side I had pre eclampsia with my first child, dont feel like you're wasting their time, tell them your concerns. All the best

Agree to call your caregiver but am doubtful it would preeclampsia at this point in pregnancy.  Have you had pregnancy hypertension or any protein in your urine?  But at this stage, you should call your doctor if you are feeling that lousy.  good luck

question: Sickness headache and pain in stomach due date yesterday anyone know why??,
title: preclampsia??
